verses.verse: And it came to pass in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H6218>month<s%>, the tenth day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that <S%H582>certain<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: Is it to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of me that ye are <S%H935>come<s%>? As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, I will not be inquired of by <S%H1875>you<s%>.
Wilt thou <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H1121>them<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, wilt thou <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H3045>them<s%>? Cause them to know the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>;

and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H3027>sware<s%> <S%H5375>unto<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and made myself <S%H3045>known<s%> unto them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, when I <S%H3027>sware<s%> <S%H5375>unto<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>;

in that <S%H3117>day<s%> I <S%H3027>sware<s%> <S%H5375>unto<s%> <S%H3318>them<s%>, to bring them forth out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into a <S%H776>land<s%> that I had <S%H8446>searched<s%> out for <S%H2100>them<s%>, flowing with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, which is the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of all <S%H776>lands<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7993>them<s%>, Cast ye away every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> of his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H2930>defile<s%> not yourselves with the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

But they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against <S%H14>me<s%>, and would not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto <S%H376>me<s%>; they did not every man cast <S%H7993>away<s%> the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> of their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, neither did they <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>. Then I <S%H559>said<s%> I would pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon <S%H3615>them<s%>, to accomplish my <S%H639>anger<s%> against them in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

But I <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H2490>sake<s%>, that it should not be profaned in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, <S%H8432>among<s%> which they <S%H5869>were<s%>, in whose sight I made myself <S%H3045>known<s%> unto <S%H3318>them<s%>, in bringing them forth out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
So I caused them to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.
And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H3045>showed<s%> them mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, which if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%>, he shall live in <S%H2425>them<s%>.

Moreover also I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, to be a <S%H226>sign<s%> between me and <S%H3045>them<s%>, that they might know that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that sanctifieth <S%H6942>them<s%>.

But the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against me in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: they <S%H1980>walked<s%> not in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and they <S%H3988>rejected<s%> mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, which if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>keep<s%>, he shall <S%H2425>live<s%> in <S%H7676>them<s%>; and my sabbaths they <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H2490>profaned<s%>. Then I <S%H559>said<s%> I would pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, to consume <S%H3615>them<s%>.

But I <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H2490>sake<s%>, that it should not be profaned in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, in whose <S%H5869>sight<s%> I brought them <S%H3318>out<s%>.

Moreover also I <S%H3027>sware<s%> <S%H5375>unto<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, that I would not <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I had <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2100>them<s%>, flowing with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, which is the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of all <S%H776>lands<s%>;

because they <S%H3988>rejected<s%> mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, and <S%H1980>walked<s%> not in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>: for their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%>.
Nevertheless mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>spared<s%> <S%H7843>them<s%>, and I destroyed them <S%H6213>not<s%>, neither did I make a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto their <S%H1121>children<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, <S%H3212>Walk<s%> ye not in the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, neither <S%H8104>observe<s%> their <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, nor <S%H2930>defile<s%> yourselves with their <S%H1544>idols<s%>.
I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, and do <S%H6213>them<s%>;
and <S%H6942>hallow<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>; and they shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> between me and <S%H3045>you<s%>, that ye may know that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

But the <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against <S%H1980>me<s%>; they walked not in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, neither <S%H8104>kept<s%> mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H120>them<s%>, which if a man <S%H6213>do<s%>, he shall <S%H2425>live<s%> in <S%H2490>them<s%>; they profaned my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>. Then I <S%H559>said<s%> I would pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon <S%H3615>them<s%>, to accomplish my <S%H639>anger<s%> against them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

Nevertheless I <S%H7725>withdrew<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H2490>sake<s%>, that it should not be profaned in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, in whose <S%H5869>sight<s%> I brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%>.

Moreover I <S%H3027>sware<s%> <S%H5375>unto<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, that I would <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them through the <S%H776>countries<s%>;

because they had not <S%H6213>executed<s%> mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, but had <S%H3988>rejected<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and had <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, and their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1544>idols<s%>.
Moreover also I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H2706>statutes<s%> that were not <S%H2896>good<s%>, and <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> wherein they should not <S%H2421>live<s%>;

and I <S%H2930>polluted<s%> them in their own <S%H4979>gifts<s%>, in that they caused to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the fire all that <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7356>womb<s%>, that I might make them <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, to the end that they might <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Therefore <S%H1121><s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: In this moreover have your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H1442>blasphemed<s%> <S%H4603>me<s%>, in that they have committed a trespass against <S%H4604>me<s%>.

For when I had <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%>, which I <S%H3027>sware<s%> <S%H5375>to<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> unto <S%H7200>them<s%>, then they saw every <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill<s%>, and every <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>, and they <S%H2076>offered<s%> there their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, and there they <S%H5414>presented<s%> the <S%H3708>provocation<s%> of their <S%H2076>offering<s%>; there also they <S%H7760>made<s%> their <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%>, and they poured <S%H5258>out<s%> there their <S%H5262>drink-offerings<s%>.

Then I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1116>them<s%>, What meaneth the high place whereunto ye <S%H935>go<s%>? So the <S%H8034>name<s%> thereof is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1117>Bamah<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Wherefore <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: Do ye <S%H2930>pollute<s%> yourselves after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>? and play ye the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations<s%>?

and when ye <S%H5375>offer<s%> your <S%H4979>gifts<s%>, when ye make your <S%H1121>sons<s%> to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, do ye <S%H2930>pollute<s%> yourselves with all your <S%H1544>idols<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>? and shall I be <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of by <S%H1004>you<s%>, O house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, I will not be inquired of by <S%H1875>you<s%>;

and that which <S%H5927>cometh<s%> into your <S%H7307>mind<s%> shall not be at <S%H559>all<s%>, in that ye say, We will <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, as the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H776>countries<s%>, to <S%H8334>serve<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone<s%>.

As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, surely with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and with <S%H2534>wrath<s%> poured <S%H5186>out<s%>, will I be king over <S%H4427>you<s%>:

and I will bring you <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, and will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you out of the <S%H776>countries<s%> wherein ye are <S%H6327>scattered<s%>, with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and with <S%H2534>wrath<s%> poured <S%H5186>out<s%>;
and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, and there will I enter into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with you <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face<s%>.

Like as I entered into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, so will I enter into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with <S%H5002>you<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
And I will cause you to <S%H5674>pass<s%> under the <S%H7626>rod<s%>, and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H4562>bond<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>;

and I will purge <S%H1305>out<s%> from among you the <S%H4775>rebels<s%>, and them that <S%H6586>transgress<s%> against <S%H3318>me<s%>; I will bring them forth out of the <S%H776>land<s%> where they <S%H4033>sojourn<s%>, but they shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

As for <S%H1004>you<s%>, O house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H3212>Go<s%> <S%H5647>ye<s%>, serve every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H1544>idols<s%>, and <S%H310>hereafter<s%> <S%H8085>also<s%>, if ye will not hearken unto <S%H6944>me<s%>; but my holy <S%H8034>name<s%> shall ye no more <S%H2490>profane<s%> with your <S%H4979>gifts<s%>, and with your <S%H1544>idols<s%>.

For in my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H4791>height<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, there shall all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, all of <S%H5647>them<s%>, serve me in the <S%H776>land<s%>: there will I <S%H7521>accept<s%> <S%H1875>them<s%>, and there will I require your <S%H8641>offerings<s%>, and the <S%H7225>first-fruits<s%> of your <S%H4864>oblations<s%>, with all your holy <S%H6944>things<s%>.

As a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> will I <S%H7521>accept<s%> <S%H3318>you<s%>, when I bring you out from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>countries<s%> wherein ye have been <S%H6327>scattered<s%>; and I will be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in you in the sight of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, when I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, into the <S%H776>country<s%> which I <S%H3027>sware<s%> <S%H5375>to<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And there shall ye <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and all your <S%H5949>doings<s%>, wherein ye have <S%H2930>polluted<s%> <S%H6962>yourselves<s%>; and ye shall loathe yourselves in your own <S%H6440>sight<s%> for all your <S%H7451>evils<s%> that ye have <S%H6213>committed<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, when I have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with you for my <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H7451>sake<s%>, not according to your evil <S%H1870>ways<s%>, nor according to your <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H5949>doings<s%>, O ye <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H8486>south<s%>, and <S%H5197>drop<s%> thy word toward the <S%H1864>south<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> in the <S%H5045>South<s%>;

and <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H3341>Behold<s%>, I will kindle a <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H398>thee<s%>, and it shall devour every <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> in <S%H3002>thee<s%>, and every dry <S%H6086>tree<s%>: the <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H7957>flame<s%> shall not be <S%H3518>quenched<s%>, and all <S%H6440>faces<s%> from the <S%H5045>south<s%> to the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall be burnt <S%H6866>thereby<s%>.
And all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> that <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, have <S%H1197>kindled<s%> <S%H3518>it<s%>; it shall not be quenched.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H162>I<s%>, Ah <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>! they <S%H559>say<s%> of <S%H4911>me<s%>, Is he not a speaker of <S%H4912>parables<s%>?
